title: When Alonso threw out Sainz's lucky charm during his F1 rookie year
summary: A 'lucky hat' had brought Sainz great results across his junior career and into F1, until his hero Fernando Alonso chucked it into a crowd of Spanish fans

qa_pairs.question: Which Spanish driver is known for throwing away Carlos Sainz's lucky hat during his rookie year in Formula 1?
What item did Carlos Sainz consider to be a 'lucky charm' during his racing career?
In which series did Carlos Sainz achieve great results before entering Formula 1?
